translation.Our mission is to make agriculture susta: Our mission is to make agriculture sustainable in the world through technology.
translation.Click the button above to sync your Meta: Click the button above to sync your Metamask wallet
translation.We want to make the world a sustainable: We want to make the world a sustainable place where living beings and nature can live in harmony. Our project consists of a decentralized certification of rural producers, with a sustainability token reward system, using blockchain technology and the Ethereum platform.
